Lines.Speaker: Sandstorm Trooper
Lines.Text: All units! All units! We found another bounty hunter.

Lines.Speaker: Sandstorm Trooper
Lines.Text: This time it is a Mandalorian! We need all possible backup to our position! Fast fast fast!

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Guess I am not the only one after that bounty… Gonna try those odds.
